sourcesContent:
export default [ { //1 title: "Homemade Beet Pasta", imageUrl: "https://cdn.pickuplimes.com/cache/c7/7e/c77ea50c548c004f3eccc0b37c28017b.jpg", "recipeText": "This vibrant dough cooks into beautifully tender, chewy noodles. A lot of love (and arm strength) goes into making your own fresh pasta, but the result is absolutely worth it. This dough is perfect for noodles, but can also be used in lasagna or filled pasta like ravioli or tortellini. Since so much love is going into the dough, we think it's best to let it shine and use simple sauces to help highlight the flavour of the pasta itself." }, {//2 title: "High Protein Vegan Pancakes", imageUrl: "https://cdn.pickuplimes.com/cache/57/74/577462c6b522de8b6eb51fce0a409d88.jpg", "recipeText": "These filling, protein rich pancakes are a great start of your day and can be even made ahead and enjoyed throughout the week. Just heat them up in a pan, microwave or oven, top them with your favourite toppings and breakfast is served! After having this feast, your day is sure to be a good one." }, {//3 title: "Vegan Chocolate Cake", imageUrl: "https://cdn.pickuplimes.com/cache/1d/d5/1dd5cb4e1d530ea61e2b4bd25dc45dca.jpg", "recipeText":

"A good chocolate cake can be enjoyed on just about any special occasion: birthdays, anniversaries, graduations, potluck parties. It's a classic! This chocolate cake is the new and improved version of our original recipe: it's delicious, moist, and fluffy, and no one will even guess it's completely plant-based!"

}, {//4 title: "Blueberry Almond Oatmeal", imageUrl: "https://cdn.pickuplimes.com/cache/63/c6/63c60357d76cb42e6c46431214505515.jpg", "recipeText": "The flavour of sweet blueberries and the nutty taste of almonds are a classic combination found in many delicious baking recipes. We matched these ingredients to make this vibrant purple-coloured oatmeal. It is wholesome, filling, and an absolute treat for the eyes." }, {//5 title: "Mocha Hazelnut Oatmeal", imageUrl: "https://cdn.pickuplimes.com/cache/69/02/69021b7cfa93a783a7fbfc5ec0e0ac1b.jpg", "recipeText": "When you combine chocolate and hazelnuts, you immediately get a decadent, praline, Nutella-like taste that will make you feel like you're having dessert for breakfast. With instant coffee is added to the mix, it enhances the chocolate flavour and imparts an incredible mocha flavour." }, {//6 title: "Blue Butterfly Pea Latte", imageUrl: "https://cdn.pickuplimes.com/cache/6d/33/6d33c950fb35dd682b7088c11bef8c28.jpg", "recipeText":"This blue latte is both beautiful and delicious! The blue powder comes from butterfly pea flowers and can be used to make a caffeine-free herbal tea. The plant is most common in southeast Asian countries, but due to its popularity, it can now be found in many countries around the world. Pro tip: scale up the recipe to make a large batch of the powdered mix for quick lattes on-demand!" }, {//7 title: "Fruity Caramelized Onion & Feta Pizza", imageUrl: "https://cdn.pickuplimes.com/cache/96/87/9687714c97df372af746b17a0e1034e3.jpg", "recipeText":"This pizza is our new absolute favourite! You might not think to put fruit on pizza, but it's next level when paired with a caramelized onion spread, peppery arugula, creamy tofu feta , and a tangy balsamic reduction" }, {//8 title: "Banana Coffee Muffins", imageUrl: "https://cdn.pickuplimes.com/cache/eb/9b/eb9bd9db866148a89059a13a8616cca9.jpg", "recipeText":"A coffee or tea break might seem incomplete without a tasty treat on the side. Enter these delicious muffins. Enjoy a couple of muffins alongside some plant-based yogurt or fruit to make a complete breakfast." }, {//9 title: "Peanut Butter Cookie Dough Energy Balls", imageUrl: "https://cdn.pickuplimes.com/cache/09/5f/095fc770e1a7725c03fcb9bf7e0e701d.jpg", "recipeText":"Energy balls are a fantastic on-the-go snack. This recipe is packed with creamy peanut butter, rich coconut, and crispy puffed rice." }, ]
